### Tender Description
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals for the renewal of Isilon Support and Maintenance services from January 29, 2023 to January 28, 2024. Bidders must submit their proposals through the SSC P2P portal. Amendment 1 extends the closing date to December 16, 2022. To register, please visit [this link](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and click on "Register Now". Submission through P2P is mandatory. The procurement was expired on the closing date
